title: Tanaka no Isekai Nariagari
original_name: タナカの異世界成り上がり
sinopse:
32-year old Tanaka was transported into a fantasy world where he now gets paid to hunt monsters. Despite being a clumsy weakling without particular skills, he is content in this new, magical world. But he soon begins to discover his true purpose for having been brought to this new world.

(Source: Manga Rock)
